name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Searchyy - Find on YouTube by Right-Click

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search highlighted/selected text on YouTube with right click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I developed this extension for myself and I hope you will love it too.

It's pretty simple. Right click on selected text will redirect you on YouTube with the results.

It just saves a time.
